CustomField.formula: IF(( Total_Price__c + MSRP_Trailer_Price__c )> Discount_on_Invoice__c ,(Total_Price__c + MSRP_Trailer_Price__c) - Discount_on_Invoice__c,(Total_Price__c + MSRP_Trailer_Price__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula : Calculated by deducting the Discount Price from the sum of Total Price and MSRP Trailer Price.
CustomField.label: Your Price
